name: OR_LOG_TIME_BREAKDOWN
description: This table contains documentation regarding the breakdown of the case time.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LOG_TIME_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to document the classification of the case time.

columns.name: LOG_TIME_DURATION
columns.description: This item is used to document the duration of a specified classification of the case time.
